title: Tony Quiroga - Car and Driver
description:
Tony Quiroga is an Associate Editor at Car and Driver Magazine, and one of the fast shoes that drives the car for the magazine's "Lightning Lap" feature. We talk about the Ferrari 488 Pista

This show is also a video, with visual assets paired to the conversations: https://youtu.be/YgplzFumbIs

 

Follow us!
IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @guaupants
T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 


Check out our merch!
https://teespring.com/stores/thesmokingtire?page=1
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
